DataElement.preferredName: Corticosteroid Prior Administered Yes No Unknown Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no/unknown indicator whether there was prior administration of corticosteroids.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: the prior administration of corticosteroids to the patient.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Hormones synthesized in the cortex of the adrenal gland and consist of two subclasses, glucocorticoids (carbohydrate regulation) and mineralocorticoids (electrolyte regulation).(NCI)

Concepts.definition: Hormones synthesized in the cortex of the adrenal gland and consist of two subclasses, glucocorticoids (carbohydrate regulation) and mineralocorticoids (electrolyte regulation).
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received prior steriod treatment

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did patient receive steroids prior to procurement?
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive steroids prior to procurement?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_CRF Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the patient have a condition requiring systemic treatment with either corticosteroids (greater than 10 mg daily prednisone equivalents) or other immunosuppressive medications within 14 days of study drug administration?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior treatment with either corticosteroids or other immunosuppressive medications?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Prior systemic treatment with either corticosteroids or other immunosuppressive medications?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received systemic immunomodulatory medications (including but not limited to interferons, IL-2) within 4 weeks or 5 half-lives of the drug, whichever is longer, prior to randomization?

ReferenceDocuments.name: NRG_eCRF_Text
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has the patient received systemic immunomodulatory medications (including but not limited to interferons, IL-2) within 4 weeks or 5 half-lives of the drug, whichever is longer, prior to study entry?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient receiving systemic immunosuppressive medications?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient used corticosteroids within 21 days of enrollment, except in the following situations specified in the protocol?

DataElement.changeDescription: Replaced VD Therapy Ind-3 2018278v1.0  with VD ID # 3506034 - Yes No Unknown Indicator  - dbw
